Title: How reliable are prodromal indicators of Parkinson disease?
Abstract: © 2015 Macmillan Publishers Limited. All rights reserved.The notion that the classic motor features of Parkinson disease (PD) are preceded by a prodrome has received renewed interest in the past decade. A recent study corroborates previous findings that smell loss and constipation are signifiers of nigral degeneration. But can we really predict who is going to get PD?
